4: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Noe: Sem, Cam xukuje' ri Japet.
5: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Japet: Gomer, Magog, Maday, Jaban, Tubal, Mesec xukuje' ri Tiras.
6: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol chic ri Gomer: Askenaz, Ripat xukuje' ri Togarm.
7: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol chic ri Jaban: Elis, Tarsis, Quitim xukuje' Rodanim.
8: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Cam: Cus, Mizraim, Pot xukuje' ri Canaan.
9: <pb/>E e u c'ojol ri Cus: Seba, Habil, Sabta, Raam xukuje' ri Sabtec. Ri e u c'ojol chic ri Raam: Seba xukuje' ri Dedan.
10: <pb/>Ri Cus are' u tat ri Nimrod, ri nabe cowilaj achi chuwäch ri uwächulew.
11: <pb/>Che ri Mizraim xebel wi ri aj ludeyib, ri aj anameyib, ri aj lehabitab, ri aj naptuhitab,
12: <pb/>ri aj patruseab, ri aj casluhitab xukuje' ri e aj captoritab, chque c'u wa' xebel wi ri aj pilisteyib.
13: <pb/>Ri Canaan are' u tat ri Sidon, ri nabe u c'ojol xukuje' re ri Het.
14: <pb/>Che ri Canaan xebel wi ri aj jebuseyib, aj amoreyib, aj jerjeseyib,
16: <pb/>ri aj arbadeyib, ri aj zemareyib xukuje' ri aj hamateyib.
17: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Sem: Elam, Asur, Arpaxad, Lud xukuje' ri Aram. Ri e u c'ojol ri Aram e are' ri Uz, Hul, Jeter xukuje' ri Mas.
18: <pb/>Ri u c'ojol ri Arpaxad are' ri Sala, ri u c'ojol ri Sala are' ri Heber.
19: <pb/>Ri Heber rumal rech chi xebalax quieb u c'ojol: ri nabeal Peleg u bi', pa tak c'ut ri u k'ijol xquitasala' quib ri winak ri e c'o chuwäch ri uwächulew. Ri rachalal ri Peleg, Joctan u bi'.
20: <pb/>Ri Joctan are' u tat ri Almodad, Selep, Hazar-mabet, Jera,
23: <pb/>Opir, Habil xukuje' ri Jobab. Conojel wa' e u c'ojol ri Joctan.
28: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Abraham: Isaac xukuje' ri Ismael.
29: <pb/>Ri e rija'lil e are tak wa': Nebaiot, u nabeal ri Ismael, Sedar, Abdeel, Mibsam,
31: <pb/>Jetur, Napis xukuje' Sedem. E are' tak wa' ri e u c'ojol ri Ismael.
32: <pb/>Ri e ral ri Setura, ri man kas ta rixokil ri Abraham: Zimram, Jocsan, Medan, Madian, Isbac xukuje' ri Sua. Ri e u c'ojol chic ri Jocsan: Seba xukuje' Dedan.
33: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol chic ri Madian: Epa, Eper, Hanoc, Abid xukuje' Eld. Conojel wa' e rija'lil ri Setura.
34: <pb/>Ri Abraham are' u tat ri Isaac. Ri e u c'ojol ri Isaac: Esau xukuje' ri Israel.
35: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Esau: Elipaz, Reuel, Jeus, Jaalam xukuje' ri Core.
36: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Elipaz: Teman, Omar, Zep, Gatam xukuje' ri Senaz; xukuje' are' u tat ri Amalec ruc' ri Timna.
37: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Reuel: Nahat, Zera, Sam xukuje' ri Miz.
38: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Seir: Lotan, Sobal, Zibeon, Ana, Dison, Ezer xukuje' ri Disan.
39: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Lotan: Hori xukuje' ri Hemam. Timna rana'b ri Lotan.
40: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Sobal: Alban, Manahat, Ebal, Sep xukuje' ri Onam. Ri e u c'ojol ri Zibeon: Aja xukuje' ri Ana.
41: <pb/>Ri u c'ojol ri Ana are' ri Dison. Ri e u c'ojol ri Dison: Hemdan, Esban, Itran xukuje' ri Queran.
42: <pb/>Ri e u c'ojol ri Ezer: Bilan, Zaaban xukuje' ri Jaacan. Ri e u c'ojol ri Disan: Uz xukuje' ri Aran.
43: <pb/>E are' tak ajawinelab wa' ri xetakan pa Edom c'ä majok chc'ol cajawinel ri aj israelib: Bela, u c'ojol ri Beor; ri u bi' ri u tinimit Dinab.
44: <pb/>Aretak xcäm ri Bela, are' xtakan ri Jobab pa ri u c'olbal, u c'ojol ri Zera, are c'u u tinimit ri Bosra.
45: <pb/>Aretak xcäm ri Jobab xtakan ri Husam pa ri u c'olbal, ri aj Teman.
46: <pb/>Aretak xcäm ri Husam, xtakan ri Hadad u c'ojol ri Bedad, pa ri u c'olbal, ri xch'äcan puwi' ri Madian pa ri juyub Moab; Abit c'ut u bi' ri u tinimit.
47: <pb/>Aretak xcäm ri Hadad, xtakan ri Samla, pa ri u c'olbal ri quel pa ri tinimit Masrec.
48: <pb/>Aretak xcäm ri Samla, xajawin ri Saul pa ri u c'olbal, ri aj Rehobot, ri tinimit ri c'o chunakaj ri nima'.
49: <pb/>Aretak xcäm ri Saul, xtakan ri Baal-hanan u c'ojol ri Acbor.
50: <pb/>Aretak xcäm ri Baal-hanan xtakan ri Hadad pa ri u c'olbal; Pau c'ut u bi' ri u tinimit. Ri rixokil ri Hadad Mehetabel u bi' u mia'l c'ut ri Matred xukuje' ri' u mam ri Mezaab.
51: <pb/>Aretak cäminak chic ri Hadad ri e c'amal tak be chic pa Edom e are': ri Timna, Alba, Jetet,
54: <pb/>Magdiel xukuje' ri Iram. E are' tak c'amal be wa' pa Edom.
